sentences.en: After passing through Immigration, you can claim your baggage.

sentences.cn: 起了任何性质的物理变化之后, 迁入也要受到防碍.

sentences.en: After the immigration, you will find them in the waiting room.

sentences.en: All group members should go through immigration procedure together.
sentences.cn: 你们必须一起办理入境手续.

sentences.en: Eased immigration procedures for foreign employees in the regional headquarters.
sentences.cn: 放宽了地区总部外籍员工的出入境管理规定.

sentences.en: Facility of immigration seems to have been fully as important as the nature of the conditions.
sentences.cn: 移入的难易,似乎和条件的性质同样重要.

sentences.en: Good morning. May I see your passport and your Immigration Form?
sentences.cn: 早上好. 请出示护照和入境登记表.

sentences.en: He called for a common European policy on immigration.
sentences.cn: 他要求欧洲国家实施共同的移民政策。

sentences.en: Immigration procedures for Hong Kong residents, tourists and businessmen are streamlined.
sentences.cn: 本港居民 、 游客和商人的入境手续已经简化.

sentences.en: One more thing , when will they return the immigration card to us?
sentences.cn: 还有, 他们什么时候会把入境登记卡还给我们 呢 ?

sentences.en: Please go upstairs and proceed through security check and immigration.
sentences.cn: 请上楼做安全检查并办理出境手续.

sentences.cn: 入境事务处负责执行上述职务.
